ModMetaData.name: More Antitoxic Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds both new antitoxic lung genes, and general toxic resistance genes. General Toxic gains genes that change their related toxic resistance by 75%, 25%, -25%, -50%, -75%, and -100%, while the lungs get all but the -25%. If you are using alpha genes, Frail Antitoxic Lungs and Tox Vulnerability are replaced by my own versions, which use a more generic graphic and give 2 metabolic efficiency.
[url=https://discord.gg/fYP8qkcNDh]Discord link[/url] for those who want an easier way to ask questions, make requests, or just chat. I'll also be posting new releases there.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url]
